attributes.action: Seek full  access to The 2021-2027 Erasmus+ Programme for all UK participants
attributes.additional_details: Erasmus + mobility experiences change people’s lives , opening up new horizons and creating greater opportunities to achieve their personal life goals . It gives them confidence and raises arid esteem as they achieve things they had never even dreamed possible . Quote from a recovering alcoholic “ Doing my work placement in Gothenburg helped me believe in myself again snd  gave  me back my love of wood  and I now went to help others learn to love working with wood .”
attributes.background: Maintaining access to the most  successful European lifelong learning programmes ever is key to continued economic growth in the UK . Incoming participants benefit the local economy and the local communities, outgoing participants Life changing experiences  giving them an edge in applying  for jobs

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330917
